column1: Computer Science (Augmented and Virtual Reality) - MSc
column5: The MSc in Computer Science is an exciting one-calendar-year programme aimed at excellent students who are keen to deepen their existing knowledge of computing. The expectation of graduates is that this course enables them to have rewarding careers in Computing or in a profession that has Computing or IT as a core component. This course is also a suitable preparation for PhD studies.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
